```{r, include = FALSE}
library(command)
library(fs)

                           "extdata/swiss")
dir_copy(path = path_swiss,
         new_path = getwd(),
         overwrite = TRUE)
dir_create("out")	 

knitr::opts_chunk$set(collapse = TRUE,
                      engine.opts = "-l",
                      comment = ""
)

nms_articles <- "a1_quickstart.Rmd|a2_shell_script.Rmd|a3_makefile.Rmd|a4_workflow.Rmd"
```
